description: At Atrium Boutique Hotel they leave no stone unturned when it comes to exclusive holidays. Revel in the lap of luxury and discover the spirit of Mysore only at The Atrium Boutique Hotel which stands as a calm tranquil oasis on the ever busy and energetic Bangalore Mysore State Highway, Mysore.
address: Atrium, #110/1A1, Near columbia Asia Hospital, Mysore - Bangalore Road
